content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great investment. So, what price were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month. It's a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, isn't it?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 500 euros per month is not enough for such a prime location. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Are you willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I can increase the amount. Let's say 550 euros per month. This should be a good price for both parties, right?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 550 euros is a bit more reasonable, but I'm looking for a tenant who values the quality and location of the apartment. Are you willing to go a bit higher to secure this place?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 575 euros per month. This should be a good deal for you, right?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While 575 euros is closer to my expectations, I'm still not convinced that it reflects the true value of the apartment. It's a unique opportunity to live in the heart of the city with all amenities nearby. Are you sure you can't go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can meet you halfway. How about 590 euros per month? That's as high as I can go.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 590 euros per month is getting closer, but I'm still not convinced it's the best offer I can get. This apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and convenience. Are you sure you can't go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have reached my maximum budget for renting the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you have a budget in mind, but I'm looking for a tenant who values the exceptional quality and prime location of my apartment. If 590 euros is your final offer, I respectfully decline. Good day to you, Max.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
